trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Danville
There was one other sighting in Danville on or around June 9th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAlmost every evening when it is clear these objects appear to move in a straight line but when viewed through binoculars they move erractic and have red green blue lights that when the object moves the lights are on the opposite side of motion. My wife has seen them. It started a few months ago with one object now has inceased to several. Cannot tell how far away they are in the dark. I have reported these objects before here and it has gotten to be an almost every day event. I watch them until I get tired and sometime I get up through the night and look outside and they are still there. Air craft in the area seem not to see these objects or even if the aircraft passing through are civilian. These things give me a creepy feeling and to tell you the truth I am afraid of them for some reason. If the appear again and no cloud cover at night I will report them again
Summary: Bright light with colored lights in ring blurred appearance
